author: JACKSON WALKER | The National Desk
title: chevron-right
text: {p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs today will hit the mid to upper 50s.{/p}{p}Showers will take over tonight making for a wet start to your Monday morning. Lows should drop to the upper 40s in most spots.{/p}{p}Monday will have frequent showers and the chance of a thundershower or two. The best chance to hear the rumble of thunder will be along the ocean beaches, areas south of Tacoma, and in the Puget Sound Convergence Zone of north King and south Snohomish Counties. Highs on Monday will make it to the mid to upper 50s once again.{/p}{p}Rain will continue on Tuesday under gray skies. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. It will not be all that warm with daytime highs only getting to the low to mid-50s.{/p}{p}Theron Zahn{br}The KOMO 4-Cast Team{br}{/p}{p}{strong}Updated Sunday Morning{/strong}{/p}{p}The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) announced the discovery of an underground tunnel below a Gaza mosque Thursday, something it believes could be used by Hamas terrorists.{br}{/p}{p}“WATCH as IDF troops uncover a terrorist tunnel shaft hidden inside a mosque in Gaza. This is a direct threat to both Israeli and Gazan civilians,” IDF{ }{a href=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209?s=20\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209?s=20\"}wrote {/a}via X, the platform formerly known as Twitter. The tunnel was discovered by the military’s 55th brigade, according to the video.{/p}{p}The clip opens with an aerial shot of a partially-ruined mosque before the camera drops into the building. Weaving through rooms with shattered windows and ruined walls, the camera then shows a wide rectangular shaft opening into the floor.{/p}{p}Responding to the video was the American Jewish Committee (AJC), which believes it to be direct evidence of Hamas using civilians as \"human shields.\"{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740389313802535209\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}“This shows - again - how Hamas purposely uses Palestinian civilians as human shields. #FreeGazaFromHamas,” AJC{ }{a href=\"https://twitter.com/AJCGlobal/status/1740477831514403170\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/AJCGlobal/status/1740477831514403170\"}wrote{/a}.{br}{/p}{p}Others, however, were unconvinced by the video.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/gaza-hospital-director-confesses-to-role-as-hamas-operative-calls-terrorists-cowards-israel-palestine-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-ahmad-al-khalot-kamal-adwan-shifa#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/gaza-hospital-director-confesses-to-role-as-hamas-operative-calls-terrorists-cowards-israel-palestine-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-ahmad-al-khalot-kamal-adwan-shifa#\"}Gaza hospital director confesses to role as Hamas operative, calls terrorists 'cowards'{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}“Why does the Israeli army not show the alleged tunnel?” {a href=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209/quotes\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209/quotes\"}asked {/a}commentator Chris Doyle. “It has before put a drone or camera down one. We just get to see an opening in the corner. This just is not evidence. (Do I think Hamas might do this? Yes quite possibly).”{/p}{p}“Again. Every f building has basements and underground bunks,” Palestinian advocate Hadi Nasrallah {a href=\"https://twitter.com/HadiNasrallah/status/1740397709620916638\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/HadiNasrallah/status/1740397709620916638\"}said{/a}. “You keep posting them without context and without showing what is inside. Or you edit a part from outside and another inside together from different tunnels and buildings. No one believes you.”{/p}{p}The IDF has been working to combat a wide network of tunnels, which it believes Hamas is using to covertly move terrorists and weapons throughout the city. The military this month {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/nation-world/israel-flooding-hamas-terrorists-tunnels-with-seawater-report-says-gaza-strip-wall-street-journal-wsj-palestine-terrorism-middle-east-biden-netanyahu-white-house-politics-ceasefire\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/nation-world/israel-flooding-hamas-terrorists-tunnels-with-seawater-report-says-gaza-strip-wall-street-journal-wsj-palestine-terrorism-middle-east-biden-netanyahu-white-house-politics-ceasefire\"}built {/a}five pumps to channel seawater into tunnels with the intention of destroying them. Biden administration officials were reportedly told in a briefing the operation could take weeks to complete.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/european-authorities-capture-four-suspected-hamas-terrorists-this-is-shameful-and-shocking-denmark-europe-danish-israel-palestine-gaza-terrorism-benjami-netanyahu#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/european-authorities-capture-four-suspected-hamas-terrorists-this-is-shameful-and-shocking-denmark-europe-danish-israel-palestine-gaza-terrorism-benjami-netanyahu#\"}European authorities capture four suspected Hamas terrorists: 'This is shameful and shocking'{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}In November, IDF announced the {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/israel-defense-forces-destroy-network-of-hamas-terrorist-tunnels-pause-ceasefire-hostages-terrorist-al-shifa-rantisi-hospital-gaza-strip-war-middle-east-\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/israel-defense-forces-destroy-network-of-hamas-terrorist-tunnels-pause-ceasefire-hostages-terrorist-al-shifa-rantisi-hospital-gaza-strip-war-middle-east-\"}destruction {/a}of a network of tunnels below the al-Shifa Hospital. The location was one of the first places to be discovered as apart of the Hamas tunnel network.{/p}{p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs today will hit the mid to upper 50s.{/p}{p}Showers will take over tonight making for a wet start to your Monday morning. Lows should drop to the upper 40s in most spots.{/p}{p}Monday will have frequent showers and the chance of a thundershower or two. The best chance to hear the rumble of thunder will be along the ocean beaches, areas south of Tacoma, and in the Puget Sound Convergence Zone of north King and south Snohomish Counties. Highs on Monday will make it to the mid to upper 50s once again.{/p}{p}Rain will continue on Tuesday under gray skies. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. It will not be all that warm with daytime highs only getting to the low to mid-50s.{/p}{p}Theron Zahn{br}The KOMO 4-Cast Team{br}{/p}{p}{strong}Updated Sunday Morning{/strong}{/p}{p}The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) announced the discovery of an underground tunnel below a Gaza mosque Thursday, something it believes could be used by Hamas terrorists.{br}{/p}{p}“WATCH as IDF troops uncover a terrorist tunnel shaft hidden inside a mosque in Gaza. This is a direct threat to both Israeli and Gazan civilians,” IDF{ }{a href=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209?s=20\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209?s=20\"}wrote {/a}via X, the platform formerly known as Twitter. The tunnel was discovered by the military’s 55th brigade, according to the video.{/p}{p}The clip opens with an aerial shot of a partially-ruined mosque before the camera drops into the building. Weaving through rooms with shattered windows and ruined walls, the camera then shows a wide rectangular shaft opening into the floor.{/p}{p}Responding to the video was the American Jewish Committee (AJC), which believes it to be direct evidence of Hamas using civilians as \"human shields.\"{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1740389313802535209\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}“This shows - again - how Hamas purposely uses Palestinian civilians as human shields. #FreeGazaFromHamas,” AJC{ }{a href=\"https://twitter.com/AJCGlobal/status/1740477831514403170\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/AJCGlobal/status/1740477831514403170\"}wrote{/a}.{br}{/p}{p}Others, however, were unconvinced by the video.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/gaza-hospital-director-confesses-to-role-as-hamas-operative-calls-terrorists-cowards-israel-palestine-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-ahmad-al-khalot-kamal-adwan-shifa#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/gaza-hospital-director-confesses-to-role-as-hamas-operative-calls-terrorists-cowards-israel-palestine-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-ahmad-al-khalot-kamal-adwan-shifa#\"}Gaza hospital director confesses to role as Hamas operative, calls terrorists 'cowards'{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}“Why does the Israeli army not show the alleged tunnel?” {a href=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209/quotes\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1740389313802535209/quotes\"}asked {/a}commentator Chris Doyle. “It has before put a drone or camera down one.
